resources.string: Picture will be deleted from this device and from Mi Cloud. If you only want to delete it from your device, try this action from within the \"Local\" tab.

string.name: auto_upload_guide_msssage
string.Data: Automatically sync photos from other apps with Mi Cloud. You can turn this feature on or off anytime in Settings > Sync with Mi Cloud > Sync automatically.

resources.string: Use face detection to sort photos by the people that are in them
